Package org.softsmithy.lib.persistence

Utility classes and extensions for the javax.persistence package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEntity
    A mapped base class for JPA entities with reasonable defaults: A generated technical id (surrogate PK) of type Long with the generation strategy set to GenerationType.AUTO. Since a PK should not change, there is no setter method for the id property. Field access implements Serializable
    ExtendedBaseDAO<T extends AbstractEntity>  
    GenericDAO<T,ID extends Serializable>  
    ResourceLocalTransactionController  

Package org.softsmithy.lib.persistence Description

Utility classes and extensions for the javax.persistence package.
